updates.body: Coronavirus interaktif haritası sizin için SnipeSec Bilişim tarafından hazırlanıp düzenli olarak güncellenmektedir | Coronavirus map for Cyprus is brought to you by SnipeSec.
updates.headline: SnipeSec Bilişim ve Siber Güvenlik tarafıdan hazırlanan İnteraktif Coronavirus (Covid-19) haritası | Interactive Coronavirus (Covid-19) map brpught to you by SnipeSec Information Technologies anc Cyber Security

updates.body: With 8,171 new coronavirus cases, India is close to the 2 lakh-mark of total cases. In the past 24 hours, India has reported 204 deaths. With these numbers, India now ranks above France and below Italy in the global charts.
updates.headline: Coronavirus tally in India nears 2 lakh-mark with 8,171 new cases, ranks 7th in world after Italy
